author: davidb
msg: Fix class name in exception message.
Patch applied on behalf of alexandreroman with many thanks.

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1586 - Implement checkpoint support in DocumentNodeStore
Adding support for collecting expired checkpoints in create path. This should help in mitigating the case where checkpoints are frequently created (OAK-1647) .
This should fare better compared to current impl where checkpoint were only deleted when oldest checkpoint is fetched
Also added an ignored testcase for OAK-1648
